documents.document: People aren't mind-readers. We have to tell them how their words and actions made us feel. Not easy to do but reduces a lot of conflict.
Only 41 days until sunny days in #SoCal. Not that I'm counting...
I'm pretty much done with all of this #snow. I think I need to move closer to the Equator...or something.
Looking forward to a program of all #Russian music from friend @alec_k. Musical reunions are the BEST. @artspoints https://t.co/FJk0rcXkSd
This is your friendly reminder that the #bcsnow we're seeing in Vancouver is CLIMATE CHANGE. That's different from global warming #bcstorm

Even my Honours degree in Political Science has not prepared me for this Presidency...and I'm not even American! #WelcometoCanada
I see that #WelcometoCanada is trending. That does warm my heart a bit. Let's not be too proud though. Still miles to go with 1st Nations.
No hate. No fear. Everyone is welcome here. #WelcometoCanada #NoMuslimBanJFK

We've got to let people live their lives. We never know the whole story and our imaginations are dangerous things...
The worst part about gossip and slander is that it is rarely true. Moreover, it is never any of our business. I repeat - never.
Anybody else listening to Corelli violin sonatas up in the gym? Didn't think so. Ok, as you were. #Baroque
Just finished my first ever spin class ...and I didn't die. I loved it! This new app @aaptiv is amazing. #teamaaptiv https://t.co/D731eTNV0g
Our culture is one of convenience and expendability. Even our friends have become entities that we can "exchange" when we're not satisfied.
Oh, and by the way, loyalty and perseverance are REALLY hard.
Loyalty in friendships and relationships is a conscious decision to see the faults of another clearly but to not walk away.
A good test of loyalty is: what do you do when you come face-to-face with the other person's flaws? How much grace are we able to extend?
It can often take a long time to get to know the many sides of a person - including their faults. That's why loyalty is so important.
I'm still mad about the pipelines but I'm a little less angry now...#cdnpoli #bcpoli #trump https://t.co/tZISZzloB7

Despite my best (or worst?) efforts, I lost 1.5 kg over Christmas break? Are you joking? Maybe pie is the answer...
Jesus experienced about betrayal. One of his closest friends sold him out for 30 pieces of silver. He understands our pain. He lived it.
Being a Christian means being merciful, giving people a chance to explain themselves, & lifting them up in prayer - even when they hurt you.

Every year I get nervous twitches when people write "Happy New Years"...excuse me. It's only one year at a time - please. Grammar matters.
Twitter just made balloons fly across the screen. Guess they know it's my 18th birthday! Wooo hoo!

The key to a good omelette: have the pan super hot. Pan size should be medium. Wait until the egg bubbles, then add ingredients. Then FLIP!
I made an omelette with gouda, asparagus, and mushroom and it did NOT turn into scrambled eggs in the pan! #winning #nomelette #adulting
